summary: SO THE STARTER HAS BEEN A ISSUE EVER SINCE I BOUGHT THE CAR FROM MY FATHER 2 YEARS AGO.  THE KEY SEEMS TO BE THE PROBLEM SINCE I GOT THE STARTER REBUILT.  IT JUST DOESN'T START AND WILL TURN OFF AT TIMES FOR NO APPARENT REASON WHICH WOULD SCARE EVERYONE IN THE CAR. I WAS WONDERING IF THERE IS A RECALL BECAUSE THERE SHOULD BE.  *TR
